entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. How can I help you today?
Yeah, I need to return something. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a couple of weeks ago and it's just not working out for me. It's uncomfortable and the readings are all over the place.
I understand you'd like to return your VeloBand Pulse. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your purchase?
Here's the order number: VF123456. And listen, I'm really not happy. This thing is supposed to be a smart watch alternative, and it's just garbage. I want my money back.
Thank you. I've located your order. I understand your frustration. Let me check on the return policy for the VeloBand Pulse. One moment please.
(Pause) Okay, I see here that we have a standard 90 days return policy. Since your purchase was within that time frame, you are eligible for a full refund.
Ninety days? Seriously? Finally, something that makes sense! I was worried I was stuck with this thing. When can I expect the refund?

Yes, our return policy allows for returns within 90 days of purchase. To initiate the return, I'll send you a prepaid shipping label via email. Simply repackage the VeloBand Pulse in its original packaging, attach the label, and drop it off at your nearest carrier location. Once we receive the returned item, the refund will be processed back to your original payment method. This usually takes 7-10 business days.
Okay, that sounds good. So I should get an email with the label today?
Yes, you should receive the email with the prepaid shipping label within the next hour. If you don't see it, please check your spam folder. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thank you so much! I was dreading having to fight about this. This was way easier than I expected.
You're very welcome! We strive to make the return process as smooth as possible. Have a great day!
